text: Pretty Woman is a 1990 American romantic comedy movie set in Los Angeles. It stars Julia Roberts as a street prostitute and Richard Gere as a rich businessman. It became one of the highest-grossing movies of 1990. Roberts won a Golden Globe Award for her performance. Pretty Woman was released by Touchstone Pictures. == Other websites == * Category:1990 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1990s English- language movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies about prostitution Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies directed by Garry Marshall Category:Movies set in hotels Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard Category:Movies adapted into plays Category:Disney movies
title: Pretty Woman
